meanings.definition: A deck built on the sunny side of a building.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed breakfast on the sundecks of their beach house.
meanings.sent2: The hotel had multiple sundecks where guests could relax in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cozy spot on the sundecks to bask in the warmth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up her face like the sun on the sundecks.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the flowers on the sundecks brightened up the entire area.

meanings.sent1: We could see the ocean from the sundecks of the beach houses.
meanings.sent2: The resort had beautiful sundecks overlooking the pool.
meanings.sent3: The sundecks were so inviting that everyone wanted to sit there.
meanings.sent4: The sundecks stretched out like a sea of warmth and relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed across the sundecks as friends enjoyed the view.
